attributes.action: Cable Car on the Malvern Hills, Full Support.
attributes.additional_details:
Released today 9-02-2015 to the press, looks very nice indeed, Malvern has been in Decline for a few years with shops closing and the Town Centre fairly dead, it used to be very busy with a very good Market, Market has gone.
It would bring in much needed income from tourists with parking going to the upkeep of the Hills and more shops opening.
Some people say it will be an eyesore but the only eyesore is the various Quarries which are a safety issue as well.

We need this as the Local blog is suggesting so please support it, thanks.
